DzVertexMap Class Reference
[Object and Geometry Classes]

Implements a map with one value per vertex, as well as supporting discontinuous values. This class maps an arbitrary numeric value to a vertex in the geometry. It should always contain at a minimum one value per vertex. It also supports discontinuous vertex maps - where different facets can have diferent values for the same vertex. More...

#include <dzvertexmap.h>

Detailed Description

Implements a map with one value per vertex, as well as supporting discontinuous values. This class maps an arbitrary numeric value to a vertex in the geometry. It should always contain at a minimum one value per vertex. It also supports discontinuous vertex maps - where different facets can have diferent values for the same vertex.

void DzVertexMap::clearDiscontinuousData (  )  [slot]

Removes all the discontinuous values from the map

void DzVertexMap::combineMap ( int  vertCount,
DzVertexMap const *  other,
int  otherVertCount,
int  otherFacetOffset 
)

Makes this map a combination of itself and the other map. Maps must be of the same type. It assumes the verts from the other map were added directly after the verts represented in this map. The discontinuous verts are deep copied rather than shared.

void DzVertexMap::copyFrom ( DzVertexMap const *  other,
bool  deepCopyDct = false 
)

Makes this map a copy of the other. Maps must be of the same type.

DzDctVertex DzVertexMap::findDiscontinuousVertex ( int  vertexIdx  )  const
Parameters:
The index of the vertex to find discontinuous data for
Returns:
The discontinuous data for the given vertex. If there is no discontinuous data for the given vertex, an invalid (empty) discontinuous vertex data item is returned.

Parameters:
The index of the vertex to find discontinuous data for
Returns:
The discontinuous data for the given vertex. If there is no discontinuous data for the given vertex, NULL is returned.

void DzVertexMap::preSizeDiscontinuous ( int  disconCount  )  [slot]

Pre-sizes the discontinuous data for better memory performance.

void DzVertexMap::setDctIndex ( int  vertexIdx,
int  facetIdx,
int  mapIdx 
) [slot]

Sets the facet vertex to have discontinuous data which points to the given map index. This function will update existing data for the facet vertex, or will create new data if necessary.

It assumes that the valid value is already in the map.

void DzVertexMap::setVertCount ( int  vertCount  )  [slot]

Sets the vertex count of the geometry that the map is for.

Parameters:
vertCount The number of vertices in the model that this map is for.
void DzVertexMap::squeezeDiscontinuous (  )  [slot]

Takes Discontinuous down to only take as much space as is needed.

void DzVertexMap::updateDctValue ( int  oldIdx,
int  newIdx,
int  facetIdx 
) [slot]

Updates a dct value for a given facet and oldIdx. This does not remove any values from the map, it may add a new dct value if the newIdx and oldIdx have different map values.

void DzVertexMap::writeData ( DzOutFile *  file  )  const [protected, virtual]

Saves the map type, values and default values to the native file format.

Parameters:
file The file to write the data to.

Reimplemented from DzMap.
